Name: John M
Title: Great service and pieces
Review: Awesome art pieces and service here at the Mukesh gallery. They stayed open late for me to arrive and provided great attention to detail. Definitely visit if you‚Äôre in Jaipur

Name: Bhim
Title: Paintings
Review: Among experience and most helpful staff with enormous varieties of paintings found nowhere in Jaipur. One should definitely visit.

Name: Pratik K
Title: Beautiful paintings
Review: Beautiful paintings, lots of variety from rajasthani to abstract.. Rohit is amazing and very helpful. One place to find so many different paintings - looking forward to coming back here again

Name: Rajul
Title: Mesmerising collection
Review: Beautiful gallery that‚Äôs treat to the eyes all 5 floor flooded with paintings n art pieces that are rare master pieces one must come here for experience of the life time that‚Äôs so rare n beautiful

Name: Himanshu Maheshwari
Title: Astounding collection of paintings and handicrafts
Review: This gallery is in the south of jaipur (less than a km away from the airport). They have an astounding art collection spread over various floors. Apart from paintings they have a separate floor for handicrafts as well. Prices are reasonable and staff is patient.

Name: rr50
Title: Good place to buy high quality artwork for home!
Review: Read about Mukesh art gallery on this platform and decided to visit with family. This place is filled with high quality artwork. Like any art gallery or shop one has to look for that piece which is special for themselves. A very large collection over several floors. If you are interested in buying Indian art for your home then you won‚Äôt be disappointed. Go with a lot of patience though as there is a large stock.

Name: Pradeep M
Title: Spoilt for choice
Review: Not commercial. A wholesale treasure trove spanning five floors that has all kinds of paintings be it miniature, traditional folk, contemporary and super realistic oil paintings as well. Highly recommended for art lovers! One of a kind in Jaipur.

Name: Pooja Karan bafna
Title: Amazing and stunning art piece found
Review: We recently bought an absolutely stunning painting from Mukesh Art Gallery. We are from Chennai and we have been looking for a masterpiece since a long time but we finally we found it here. Also thank you to the entire staff here who are patient enough to guide us through every bit

Name: Chavi gupta
Title: You can't miss it
Review: Visited the Mukesh Art Gallery in Jaipur. They have a fantastic collection of  paintings of various art forms . Was very difficult to select a painting from the vast collection . Absolutely  loved their collection .

Name: Mitali G
Title: Amazing Experience!!
Review: Stunning art pieces at this gallery! Owner and staff are excellent and showed us so many varieties of paintings for our house.They are very courteous and knowledgeable.Great prices too for the quality of original art

Name: Sanjoy G
Title: Excellent art gallery for all kinds of arts and handicrafts
Review: Amazing and extensive art collection with very reasonable prices. All styles of paintings and handicrafts. Very knowledgable and friendly staff

Name: Joe Cooke
Title: Highly recommend
Review: Brilliant experience shopping here - great paintings by local artists, friendly staff and fair prices

Name: Nina Cooke
Title: Fantastic choice of art at reasonable prices
Review: Great experience viewing and buying art here. Styles to suit every taste with reasonable prices and superb, non-salesy service. Highly recommend.

Name: Sarah D
Title: Lovely paintings
Review: Great variety of styles and sizes with friendly staff. A short drive outside of central Jaipur. I would recommend.

Name: Abhishek
Title: Great experience and collection
Review: Great collection of various art forms. Staff is welcoming, knowledgeable and the owner himself is a great guide. They patiently spent time with us , helping to uncover our needs and showed several paintings , multiple times with great detailed overview of each. Extremely satisfied with our day spent at the gallery and the unique purchases we made !

Name: Shubh G
Title: AMAZING
Review: Really good collection and variety of paintings and other crafts. They have exclusive pieces that can‚Äôt be found elsewhere. The staff is so friendly and Mr. Rohit was very hospitable. We will make sure to go back!

Name: Rahul Rachamalla
Title: Show me a better hidden gem in Jaipur than this
Review: Who knew that we'd purchase one of our best art collections from a nondescript place in a seemingly mundane location like this gallery. Rohit was extremely pleasant to interact with and shares a great taste in art. He was genuinely helpful in closing a great deal on a collectible piece. Me and my wife can't wait to frame it and hang it in our home in California. If you are looking for something more than a run off the mill type of art work, this is your place.

Name: OnAir638788
Title: Best paintings
Review: Amazing place. Brilliant collection of paintings. The staff was extremely cooperative. Unbeatable prices

Name: Divir J
Title: Amazing gallery - a must visit in Jaipur!
Review: We absolutely loved the Gallery. The collection of art here is exquisite and carefully curated over the years under the watchful eye of the Gupta family. We were attended to very enthusiastically by Rohit Gupta - the proprietor himself who also happened to be my junior from school! We ended up buying a large piece of art for our living room in London. This is something for which we had searched quite a few galleries across the UK and India but our search finally ended at Mukesh Art Gallery. Highly recommended for all art enthusiasts and investors who happen to visit Jaipur.

Name: trishala shastri
Title: Mesmerizing art
Review: Astounding art collection! They have a great and huge collection of beautiful paintings, loved it üôÇ. Must visit place!!!

Name: Richa S
Title: Exceptional Service
Review: Must visit when in Jaipur! I spent almost 2.5 hours here looking at the amazing collection they have. The staff patiently responded to all my queries and I finally ended up buying not one but four madhubani paintings. The owner of the store also came and provide his suggestions. Classic example of great customer service.

Name: Rachita Maheshwari
Title: Good collection, welcoming staff.
Review: Mukesh art gallery is truly incredible, with impeccable collection of artwork. Looking at all their jaw dropping artwork just makes you feel alive! Amazed by their collection, under one roof you can find varied forms of art. Very knowledgeable and welcoming staff. Had a good interactive experience with owner Mr.Rohit Gupta, Thank you Mr. Rohit for helping me in final selection. One of the best art galleries, highly recommended place to go.

Name: Peter W
Title: Great and varied collection!
Review: Wonderful gallery with knowledgeable, accommodating staff. We were interested in Rajasthani miniatures and they showed us many options of various ages and types. We were able to find what we liked and will gladly return next time we are in Jaipur.

Name: Santana K
Title: A very satisfied customer !
Review: It was so easy getting our precious paintings framed here - definitely the fastest high quality framing service that I have ever encountered ! Great suggestions, patient and courteous staff and overall just a wonderful experience. Do visit my favorite art gallery in Jaipur !

Name: Dinesh
Title: Delightful
Review: Mukesh Art Gallery brings you some of the finest work from the industry. You can check ample of amazing work actually before you buy one that you love! Staff is supportive and professional that makes your experience delightful.

Name: Khushi pathak
Title: Great
Review: It was great visiting here. Very beautiful pieces n artwork under one roof. Undoubtedly the best place for art lovers in jaipur.

Name: Siddharth Pathak
Title: Excellent experience
Review: Huge Collection of Modern Arts Wide variety and pocket friendlyHandicrafts and wide range of deity collection

Name: Sandeep M
Title: One Stop Gallery for all your Art requirements
Review: Amazing collection with highly skilled and well informed staff to guide and advise your best buy. Bought an outstanding work of Pichwai art'painting which was simply a masterpiece found here with Mukesh Art Gallery, Jaipur.

Name: Pablo
Title: Exceptional paintings, for every taste
Review: Wonderful art of different styles. Staff very supportive, if something is missing they can help finding it for you. Get some space in your apartments because you will want to buy something!

Name: Tanvi
Title: Impressive gallery.
Review: The art gallery has a wide range of paintings and it is very impressive. Must visit if you want to buy paintings for your house, work place or for gifting.

Name: Purvi J
Title: Authentic, Elegant and Most Adorable  and affordable gallery of Jaipur.
Review: I bought a painting for my house in Dubai. And everyone coming to my house, simply loved it.Must visit this place. An ultimate gallery in Jaipur.

Name: Ekanisha Maheshwari
Title: Mesmerizing collection
Review: Mesmerizing art collection... perfect place for art lover...they have every kind of collection..as a interior designer I'm loving it....their collections creates a mood for every corner for your house..

Name: Akshita Airan
Title: Fill your house with the amazing paintings by Mukesh Art Gallery. Must visit !
Review: Perfect place in the city of Jaipur for art lovers. Vast collection of paintings, one can definitely find the perfect taste for themselves. Got few for my newly designed house. Beautifully curated store. And I was surprised to see the collections ranging from modern abstract to traditional to contemporary. Fill your house with the amazing paintings by Mukesh Art Gallery. Must visit !

Name: Lochan Gupta
Title: Never seen so much of art at one place
Review: Amazing collection, perfect place for art lovers . Got one for my living room from their European art collection . Must visit place, value for money

Name: Surbhi Rajpal
Title: Awwesoommee Art Gallery with unique collection of paintingsüëçü•∞
Review: A superb beautiful collection of paintings with a huge variety and varied concepts. A treat to eyes & a rainbow of Colors to add to your home & anywhere.Museum quality canvas created with Colors & digital effect which is the first in the country conceptualised. Must visit to the store to view the collection & add to your home.

Name: SANJANA
Title: Amazing
Review: Exclusive collection of art itrms ad paintings. All at very reasonable price.Good collection of artwork

Name: Anu
Title: It was easy to find a royal baraat painting given how much detail oriented I am with intricacy of art. Great staff too !
Review: Great place with plethora of art collections . I am buying a royal baraat painting and it looks very classy .

Name: Surekha
Title: Wonderful experience
Review: Beautiful art work and showpiece.wonderful range in all categories. A must visit. üòÄ Enjoyed shopping and wonderful customer experience.

Name: Megha Ramani
Title: Great place !
Review: If you‚Äôre looking for one stop shop for all types of paintings that you can find in india, THIS IS THE PLACE !Great staff, very knowledgeable and gives each client attention to whatever their requirements are.  I personally bought 3-4 paintings and the price was amazingly competitive. They have all sorts of paintings like pichwai, modern pichwai, Tanjor etc. the kind that you see in elledecor india and archdigest india. Best place for paintings in town.

Name: Ebi P
Title: Most Amazing Art Shop
Review: 4 floors of the most amazing arts and crafts, from classic gold leaf to modern. What a wonderful art gallery

Name: girish k
Title: Worth the effort...
Review: Had to sacrifice trip to Chokhi Dhani to visit the place on last evening of Jaipur stay. But it was worth it. It was easy to locate the shop. They have Huge collection of more than 15000 pieces.  Paintings were amazing and there were huge options in all price brackets and types. Gemstones art peices were great. Retail business is not there forte, but then also owner Mr Rohit and entire staff were very cooperative and patient. Bought few peices for my new home. Staff polietly did secure packing for onward journey. Drawback is lack of online presence and photography is also not allowed. They don't do much bargaining either.

Name: Ambassador367425
Title: Awesome experience‚Ä¶
Review: Excellent collection and really nice and friendly staff. Owner was really helpful and honest. I found exactly what I was looking for. Highly recommend this place if you are looking for something unique. I would say one of the best art gallery in Jaipur. Delightful experience.

Name: Roy
Title: Excellent collection
Review: Excellent collection, variety of paintings collection of different designs and history of Rajasthan.

Name: Ram
Title: Temple for all art lovers!!
Review: Excellent collection !! While each piece of artwork can evoke a different feeling or make you think a certain way, the entire collection is truly amazing.Must visit art gallery in Jaipur.

Name: Arpit A
Title: Awesome
Review: Great collection backed up by excellent customer services.Best in North India for paintings and handicrafts

Name: MB
Title: Phenomenal collection - highly recommend it!
Review: We recently visited Mukesh art gallery and would highly recommend that you visit as well. Our experience was truly fabulous. We were a few people and there was something to match each of our tastes and budget. Not only that the collection is phenomenal, the staff is very friendly and helpful. The owner is also always present and patiently guides people towards understanding art.  This place is a ‚Äòmust visit‚Äô when you are in Jaipur. In a gallery that spans several floors, we found an outstanding collection of paintings from new and established painters, miniatures, and paintings from different parts of India that reflected old and evolving art forms and techniques. The founder/owners had a vision about promoting art and artists and this place reflects their passion. In some sense, the collection gives a glimpse of India. We enjoyed visiting the gallery, seeing the collection, and buying paintings there. Highly recommend it ‚Äì it will be truly worth your time.

Name: Ramjas Swami
Title: A must visit place
Review: The gallery houses thousands of paintings and handicrafts on display. All unique and beautiful  pieces. Prices are very affordable as well. Special mention to the staff for being very patient and friendly

Name: Seerat saini
Title: Awesome place to visit
Review: Very nice collection and polite behaviour of owner and every employee working out there. Affordable prices too

Name: Sunita
Title: Show stopper in jaipur art work.
Review: My favourite part was the range of art work available here.This place caters to the needs of all sorts of art work in terms of costing and assortment of work.

Name: Amit Ahuja
Title: Nice collection
Review: Very nice collection and friend staff patiently showing all the paintings. Prices are also reasonable.

Name: Shrikant Bagal
Title: Fantastic Place.
Review: A must visit place when in Jaipur.Amazing collection of paintings and other art items. Its almost 6 floors of mind blowing experience.

Name: Suchi
Title: Awesome!!
Review: One of the best art collections I have ever seen in Jaipur. The collection includes art pieces and all sorts of different paintings. The frames do the justice to all the hard work done by artists.Rohit helped us to find what we wanted. From now onwards this place is a ‚Äòmust visit‚Äô @ each India trip.

Name: Dr.Deepak
Title: Exclusive place for art paintings and gift items
Review: Mukesh Art Gallery is definitely one of the best art galleries in not only in Jaipur but I would say in Rajasthan. Must visit place to buy art paintings, gifts, other monumental items.Happy Customer.Dr.Deepak

Name: vivek s
Title: Awesome place
Review: Excellent place to be in if you want to be surrounded by art. The gallery has art work that would interest amateurs as well as established art collectors. Huge collection of over 16000 paintings and artefacts  which has been put up as a walk through spread over 6 floors. Ambience is comfortable and staff is very polite. I would (and already have) recommend this place to people I know. I will be a return customer, for sure!

Name: gaurav agrawal
Title: Worth a visit!
Review: Tremendous Collection of Paintings and Handicraft which Spread across various floors, Beautifully Displayed. The staff was very polite and attentive. The Price Range is also according to everyone's pocket. Strongly Recommend...

Name: Sudhakar
Title: Worth visiting a place!
Review: Best collection in town.Value for money. Excellent behaviour of staff. Really hard work done on every art peace. World class collection.Best wishes.

Name: Saumya G.
Title: Fantastic!
Review: Brilliantly curated collection! Had a lovely experience. Always found something incredible to take home!

Name: Ritu Chaudhary
Title: People are really welcoming and warm. They helped me a lot to select the exact paintings i was looking for.
Review: The collection here is exquisite. They do have really affordable collection as well. All the paintings here are absolutely stunning.

Name: Mukesh
Title: "Best art gallery"
Review: One of the best art collection ever seen.... Very helpful staff...great experience ... highly recommended.

Name: Satyadev
Title: Art  heart of Pink City
Review: It's an wonderful and mesmerising visit to Mukesh Art Gallery. The only place in pink city where  you will find all the solutions regarding art weather It's ur home ,office ,work place or any spiritual place. Very close to fortis and walking distance fm Mariot and Tapri. You must visit and find all ur solutions....Gd day....

Name: Subhash Ghotwal
Title: Massive collection
Review: It was a great experience shopping here. Massive collection of paintings and handicrafts spread across various floors. Would recommend anybody who is looking to buy affordable art.

Name: Ankur G
Title: Wonderful experience
Review: The art collection at Mukesh Art Gallery is amazing, across all tastes and budgets. Its normal to get confused with so many options, but the owner and the staff were very patient and guided us through selection and provided right inputs. We wanted to get the paintings delivered at Mumbai, and that was also arranged at reasonable cost. Finally our beautiful paintings arrived, in best shape, safely packed and delivered before the promised time.Over all a wonderful and warm experience.Must visit for art lovers or otherwise, you will definitely find something for your favorite corner in home.

Name: Syed Adeel Naqvi
Title: Heaven for art lovers at affordable prices
Review: They offer wide collection with humble and courteous staff. Located at one of the most prime location of jaipur. Indeed a great experience. The best is the reasonable price they offer along with great quality. Highly recommended. Must visit place.

Name: Prachi
Title: Amazing experience
Review: Amazing collection they have..I will highly recommend visiting there place if u r looking for unique and genuine work..üòä

Name: NandKishoreMeena
Title: Nice hidden Gem
Review: Good experience overall. Good collection to explore. One can buy paintings and other things as per their requirements. Staff was polite and courteous enough to show you each floor they have. I will definitely recommend everyone to explore this place when in Jaipur

Name: neenarzu
Title: Marvelous piece for art lovers worth a visit
Review: First time I saw a large and such a fantastic collection of artifacts and paintings which have varied taste for all cultures and religions. Very affordable and tastefully done up. As a tourist from Maharastra visiting Jaipur, this has been my one of the most memorable experience. God bless you all

Name: Piyush
Title: Unique place for art lovers
Review: Unique place for classical Indian paintings, contemporary paintings originals, licensed copies,  expertise in Rajasthani paintings. Great collection and very large inventory maintained.

Name: Surbhi surana
Title: Awesome experience
Review: Its amazing and unique art collection of handmade paintings and handicrafts. Best ever seen art gallery. All the articles were very well segmented as per the affordability of the customers. The staff was really courteous. It was very delightful experience. Must be visited by tourists who would like to carry a souvenir from jaipur.

Name: Pranay P
Title: Must visit authentic art
Review: I‚Äôm amazed to such a huge collection of beautiful paintings across different genres and mediums. Shopped for my house and picked quite a few pieces. The owner gave a good deal too!

Name: Bhaskar Y
Title: Great
Review: Looking for antique stuff and paintings for home decor or any other purpose ,Mukesh art gallery is the right place for you.Amazing collection with a lot of variety .You can get various products with reasonable prices Especially the paintings are too good,I have never been to such an amazing place.Friendly staff, Kudos to their work. Just awesome üëå

Name: Raj
Title: Wonderful collection
Review: Wonderful collection of paintings and handicrafts. A must visit for all looking for great art work.Courteous staff and well maintained art gallery.

Name: Nikhil
Title: BEST
Review: Overwhelmed with the amount of attention and level of comfort which was showered on us here. Can't believe we get to see such huge collection of paintings here. The owner Rohit Gupta Ji helps you to choose the best with his expert design advice.Cooperative staff, always smiling. Best part is that selection of such masterpieces take time and all of them were patient enough to let us choose accordingly. 100% Recommended.

Name: Gift_Gift_Gift
Title: Art Haven- A paradise for art lovers
Review: We were attended by Mr Rohit on our visit to this art haven. Rohit was kind enough to show us around the entire gallery comprising of 6 floors, housing different styles and subjects of paintings. I'll stress here by saying that this is by far the most comprehensive art gallery I have ever been to. They have a massive-massive collection of paintings of all kinds like traditional Indian, Spiritual, Modern, vintage, watercolour, acrylic, sketches etc. You name it, they have it. They have paintings and prints within all budgets. I, personally loved the luxe section which displayed one of a kind paintings and also the Pichwai section is the most intriguing one as it housed a colossal collection of Pichwais. This is a must-visit place if you are an ardent art lover, and in case you aren't, you definitely will leave the gallery turning into one !!! Apart from holding masterpieces, which one would love to acquire for their homes, they also house a wide variety of paintings and prints that can be gifted too...Be rest assured about their authenticity, quality and services. Glad that the owner was keen and enthusiastically answering all our questions and educating us about various art forms all throughout our time there. A must-visit for those who wish to acquire something that would last them a lifetime and beyond.

Name: Mahesh
Title: Affordable and genuine art
Review: Excellent collection! amazing place to be. Affordable rates. Its a must visit if one is looking for affordable genuine art!

Name: Raj Singh Rathore
Title: Loved it
Review: wasn't expecting such a huge collection of paintings under one roof! It is a hidden gem in Jaipur! Must visit

Name: Mukesh Singh
Title: Fantastic collection
Review: Fantastic collection. Every floor has a different variety. Thousands of paintings are displayed here! Must visit if in Jaipur

Name: Jay Murjani
Title: Mesmerizing pieces of art!
Review: The gallery has a beautiful and mesmerizing collection. Best part is they have every kind and type of painting one can imagine! Do visit if looking for Indian and contemporary art.

Name: VIJAY BALHARA
Title: Precious gems - Indian Art
Review: Breathtaking & Treat to Soul. Ethinic & delighted to see Indian Cultural Heritage depicted through the strokes of artists. Aesthetic Lovers can't step out without a purchase,I bet. A Classy Place in  The Land of Maharaajas

Name: Mukul M
Title: Unique stuff
Review: I always love visiting the gallery. The paintings that they have are very unique. Their prices are pretty reasonable as well!

Name: Sarthak Arun
Title: Wonderful experience!!
Review: Got everything we needed for our house under one roof. The ambience was amazing, notch product quality and amazing variety!!

Name: Inspire813124
Title: Ginormous stock!
Review: It's a ginormous art gallery with literally thousands of paintings and handicrafts. The gallery is a hidden gem in Jaipur! If someone is looking for affordable art with a lot of variety then this is a must visit! The best part is they are employing mainly the local art community.Note: It is best to visit with a prior appointment.

Name: Yogendra Maheshwari
Title: Fantastic experience! Very affordably priced!
Review: Fantastic experience! Huge space with ample of paintings and handicrafts. Staff is also very polite and patient. We bought few pieces for our house in the US!

Name: Niharika Singh
Title: Breathtaking Collection
Review: The gallery has a beathtaking collection of paintings. Thousands of pieces are displayed here. All are beautifully framed as well. Coming again for sure!

Name: Sunita Choudhary
Title: Mind-blowing painting collection
Review: It is indeed a wonderful art gallery. Superb collection. Whenever I visit this place,I am always mesmerized with their quality collection.I am a regular visitor of Mukesh Art gallery from last more than 15 years.The owner Mukesh Gupta ji is a very humble and he greets all visitor with smile.The after sales service is also  very good and is attended with great gesture and anyone who is looking for beautiful painting, artwork must visit this Mukesh Art Gallery.

Name: Kritika C
Title: Amazing experience
Review: One of the best art gallery i have come across. Amazing collection. All varieties are available here.

Name: Vinita kumari
Title: Superb collection
Review: Superb gallery with thousands of paintings displayed in a huge area. One can be spoilt for choice! Loce spending time here!

Name: Ankita kumari
Title: Jewel of Jaipur!
Review: Its a humongous gallery with thousands of framed paintings and handicrafts on display. I bought few contemporary paintings and I am surely coming again!

Name: Adwait Ranjan
Title: Mesmerizing collection
Review: I'm always mesmerised with their collection. Everytime I visit their store, I find something unique and different. One cannot come empty handed for sure as they have something for everyone! Kudos to the team for maintaining such huge stock of paintings and handicrafts.

Name: Sony C
Title: Fantastic experience!
Review: Superb collection! Thousands of paintings are displayed on multiple floors across all mediums and styles. They are mainly into affordable art! Overall, it was a wonderful experience. Staff is also very polite and helps you choose the best of the lot.

Name: Bimal C
Title: Superb Experience
Review: Wonderful Art Gallery! I am a regular visitor of Mukesh Art Gallery from last 20 years, Everytime I feel amazedWhenever I am in search of artwork or any framing need, I blindly visit this place and get 100 percent satisfaction. Owner Mr Mukesh Gupta has now become our family friend because of long association..

Name: AlokBansal
Title: Must visit if looking for affordable art
Review: Amazing collection!!You can spend whole day here looking at the variety of Arts available at the Gallery.Simply Passion at Work..

Name: Rajkumari Sudrania
Title: Don't miss it by any chance.!
Review: Beautiful collection of paintings and handicrafts. I personally love their Tanjore collection. Prices are pretty reasonable and staff is also very cooperative.

Name: Shruti
Title: Beautiful handicrafts
Review: Amazing and beautiful place to get the best handicrafts at one place. 5 star for crafts, services, maintenance and staffMust visit üòçüòç

Name: Mansi Agrawal
Title: Beautiful Art Gallery
Review: Amazing art Galary. Beautiful Collection. Co-operative Management.It's a must must visit in Jaipur.Very Beautifully Managed and maintained.Thank You.

Name: Dinesh Meena
Title: Worth visiting
Review: Its a fabulous place with ample of variety.  I bought a beautiful ganesha painting and my friend bought a miniature painting. Prices are very resonable and staff is also friendly.

Name: Rajan Sodhi
Title: Worth a visit!
Review: Loved the collection. Bought a few paintings for my house in Delhi. The prices are very reasonable and I think their collection is the best in Jaipur.

Name: Reena Sodhi
Title: Hidden Gem
Review: It's a huge gallery with thousands of paintings. Bought a few pieces for my house from here. Very friendly and patient staff. Definitely coming again!

Name: Ritu Maheshwari
Title: Fantabulous
Review: Awesome collection. A must visit gallery. Picked a Tanjore shreenathji painting for my house. Must visit if in Jaipur.

Name: Rahul
Title: Fantastic..
Review: Nice collection of handmade arts.Large range of varieties  as well .Antique pieces. must visit place for handicrafts , gemstone etc

Name: shalbha
Title: Great collection
Review: Great collection of paintings and artwork. Highly recommended. Have some extra time in hand to explore fully.
